programme.title: The School of Rock
programme.desc: Overly enthusiastic guitarist Dewey Finn (Jack Black) gets thrown out of his bar band and finds himself in desperate need of work. Posing as a substitute music teacher at an elite private elementary school, he exposes his students to the hard rock gods he idolizes and emulates -- much to the consternation of the uptight principal (Joan Cusack). As he gets his privileged and precocious charges in touch with their inner rock 'n' roll animals, he imagines redemption at a local Battle of the Bands.

programme.title: Mr. Deeds
programme.desc: Longfellow Deeds (Adam Sandler) is a sweet, lovable guy leading a simple but happy life in the tiny hamlet of Mandrake Falls, New Hampshire. Life is good at the small town restaurant until two corporate execs bring news that Deeds is about to be rolling in a different kind of dough. A long-lost relative has left him an inheritance of 40 billion dollars along with the largest media company in the world. It's a fish out of water, rags to riches story that has local tabloid reporters salivating.

programme.title: Hot Tub Time Machine
programme.desc: Four pals are stuck in a rut in adulthood: Adam (John Cusack) has just been dumped, Lou (Rob Corddry) is a hopeless party animal, Craig (Craig Robinson) is a henpecked husband, and Jacob (Clark Duke) does nothing but play video games in his basement. But they get a chance to brighten their future by changing their past after a night of heavy drinking in a ski-resort hot tub results in their waking up in 1986.

programme.title: Ocean's Eleven
programme.desc: Dapper Danny Ocean is a man of action. Less than 24 hours into his parole from a New Jersey penitentiary, the wry, charismatic thief is already rolling out his next plan. Following three rules: Don't hurt anybody, don't steal from anyone who doesn't deserve it, and play the game like you've got nothing to lose. Danny orchestrates the most sophisticated, elaborate casino heist in history.

programme.title: Ocean's Twelve
programme.desc: After successfully robbing five casinos in one night, Danny Ocean and his crew of thieves have big problems. Despite pulling off one of the biggest heists in Las Vegas history, the members of the gang have already spent much of the money they stole. Casino owner Terry Benedict demands that Ocean return the money, plus millions more in interest. Unable to come up the cash, the crew is forced to come together to pull off another series of heists, this time in Europe.

programme.title: Ocean's Thirteen
programme.desc: Danny Ocean and his gang hatch an ambitious plot for revenge after ruthless casino owner Willy Bank double-crosses Reuben Tishkoff, Danny's friend and mentor. First, Ocean's gang plan to hit Bank in the paycheck by reversing the precept that the house always wins. Next, they will deal a crushing blow to Bank's ego by ruining his reputation as the only hotelier to earn the Royal Review's Five Diamond Award for each of his properties.

programme.title: Cold Case
programme.desc: Valens' past haunts him when a 1998 case involving a drug mule is reopened and he is the focal point.

programme.title: Cold Case
programme.desc: Lilly and company use their unique expertise and interrogation skills to solve a killer's demented puzzle and save a young boy's life.

programme.title: Cold Case
programme.desc: Lilly gets new evidence in the 1973 murder of a young female tennis player who had won her high-profile match against the school's best male player just before her death.

programme.title: Supernatural
programme.desc: While looking for a way to defeat Eve, Sam and Dean ask Castiel to send them back in time.

programme.title: Supernatural
programme.desc: Dean, Sam, Castiel and Bobby find Eve in a small town where the citizens have been converted to demons; Eve decides to torture Sam and Dean by bringing their mother back as a demon.

programme.title: Supernatural
programme.desc: Castiel talks about the war in heaven and what happened to set Raphael against him; Bobby suspects Castiel isn't being completely honest.

programme.title: Supernatural
programme.desc: When a demon kidnaps Lisa and Ben, Sam and Dean are forced to work with an unlikely ally to save them.

programme.title: Supernatural
programme.desc: Bobby and Dean are at a loss when the wall comes down in Sam's mind; the fight for heaven comes to a head.

programme.title: Supernatural
programme.desc: Castiel issues a warning to Dean, Sam and Bobby; Dean winds up in a confrontation with Death; Sam struggles with the broken wall in his head.

programme.title: Supernatural
programme.desc: Castiel struggles with the downside of his new power; Sam suffers from hallucinations; Bobby worries that Dean will collapse under the weight of his responsibilities.

programme.title: Supernatural
programme.desc: Dean is angry when Sam disappears to pursue a case with clues identical to a mystery he encountered as a kid.

programme.title: Supernatural
programme.desc: Sam and Dean discover Osiris, a vengeful Egyptian god, is responsible for a series of gruesome murders; Osiris puts Dean on trial.

programme.title: Supernatural
programme.desc: Sam and Dean meet a witch whose anger over her husband's philandering has proved fatal for the townspeople.

programme.title: Supernatural
programme.desc: When murderous clones of Sam and Dean are created, the Winchester brothers become wanted men; Sam and Dean turn to a quirky surveillance expert (Kevin R. McNally) for help.

programme.title: Supernatural
programme.desc: Dean and Sam visit a town full of people claiming to be psychics after residents are gruesomely murdered.

programme.title: Supernatural
programme.desc: While on a hunt, Sam encounters someone from his past; Dean teams up with a quirky hunter named Garth.

programme.title: Supernatural
programme.desc: Dean, Sam and Bobby track a creature that has been attacking people in a New Jersey state park; Dean realizes a restaurant's special sandwich appears to be making people go crazy.

programme.title: Guardians of the Galaxy Vol. 2
programme.desc: Peter Quill and his fellow Guardians are hired by a powerful alien race, the Sovereign, to protect their precious batteries from invaders. When it is discovered that Rocket has stolen the items they were sent to guard, the Sovereign dispatch their armada to search for vengeance. As the Guardians try to escape, the mystery of Peter's parentage is revealed.

programme.title: San Andreas
programme.desc: A seemingly ideal day turns disastrous when California's notorious San Andreas fault triggers a devastating, magnitude 9 earthquake, the largest in recorded history. As the Earth cracks open and buildings start to crumble, Ray Gaines (Dwayne Johnson), an LAFD search-and-rescue helicopter pilot, must navigate the destruction from Los Angeles to San Francisco to bring his estranged wife (Carla Gugino) and their only daughter (Alexandra Daddario) to safety.

programme.title: Cold Case
programme.desc: When a theater owner discovers a.38 slug in a piece of set furniture that is not being used as a prop, Lilly and Jeffries reinvestigate a case involving the shooting of a local cabaret singer.

programme.title: Cold Case
programme.desc: A woman researching her family history learns that her great-grandmother was murdered in 1929 and the case was never solved, prompting Lilly to take a look.

programme.title: Cold Case
programme.desc: Days before his scheduled execution, a man Jeffries arrested in 1994 begs him to re-examine the case.

programme.title: Cold Case
programme.desc: A 1945 case involves an ambitious reporter demoted to writing trivial advice columns.

programme.title: Cold Case
programme.desc: A 1984 shooting case reopens when a new witness comes forward; Lilly follows a lead into the gambling world.

programme.title: Charmed
programme.desc: Cole attacks the Charmed Ones hoping that they will vanquish him forever; Paige is charged with the protection of a man who turns out to be the father she never knew.

programme.title: Charmed
programme.desc: A demon mummifies Phoebe's body to hold the spirit of his dead lover, Isis.

programme.title: Charmed
programme.desc: Cole kidnaps Phoebe and sends a shape-shifter in her place to manipulate Paige and Piper into giving him ownership of the manor.

programme.title: Charmed
programme.desc: Trying to win Phoebe in a twisted way, Cole casts a spell that alters reality, eliminating Paige and destroying the Power of Three.

programme.title: Charmed
programme.desc: Witch doctors lead the sisters astray using voodoo dolls; Paige abducts her ex-boyfriend's fiancee; Phoebe poses for a magazine centerfold; Piper nearly dismantles the house when she becomes an obsessive cleaner.

programme.title: Charmed
programme.desc: The sisters' nightmares spring to life, and they can escape only by unveiling the symbolic meaning of their dreams.

programme.title: Charmed
programme.desc: As Piper goes into labor, evildoers plot to carry the baby off to their kingdom. Cheryl Ladd guest stars.

programme.title: Charmed
programme.desc: When Piper's baby is nearly abducted, Paige seeks out the would-be kidnappers at a demonic black market.

programme.title: Charmed
programme.desc: The Charmed Ones team up with a leprechaun to go after a leprechaun-killing demon; Paige gets kidnapped when her luck runs out.

programme.desc: Jake Pentecost is a once-promising Jaeger pilot whose legendary father gave his life to secure humanity's victory against the monstrous Kaiju. programme.title: Sister Act
